item.title: Democrats’ Biggest Problem Right Now Is That They Are Out Of Touch And Uncool
item.description: Do Democrats have a plan other than being awful and making fools of themselves?

item.title: Leftist Wisconsin AG Just Can’t Quit His Phony ‘Fake Electors’ Witch Hunt
item.description: A new court filing blasts Wisconsin’s top prosecutor for putting politics above the law — and eviscerating the Constitution.

item.title: Trump’s Joint Address Was The Aggressively Partisan Confrontation America Needed
item.description: Making it clear which party opposes or is in favor of what is the only way to make these presidential speech moments still useful

item.title: Trump Department Of Justice Ends Biden-Era Lawfare Targeting Idaho’s Pro-Life Protections
item.description: Idaho’s pro-life protections, when enforced, are estimated to save the lives of more than 1,500 unborn babies every year.

item.title: Judge’s Failure To Recuse Himself From Trump Spending Freeze Case Shows How Court Is Rigged
item.description: A nonprofit board member himself, Judge McConnell has a motive to keep federal funding flowing to nonprofits.
